description: Associate a set of ECS Capacity Providers with a specified ECS Cluster

CapacityProviders.description: List of capacity providers to associate with the cluster
CapacityProviders.markdownDescription:
List of capacity providers to associate with the cluster

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

CapacityProvider.description: If using ec2 auto-scaling, the name of the associated capacity provider. Otherwise FARGATE, FARGATE_SPOT.
CapacityProvider.markdownDescription:
If using ec2 auto-scaling, the name of the associated capacity provider. Otherwise FARGATE, FARGATE_SPOT.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Cluster.markdownDescription:
The name of the cluster

Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Update requires: No interruption
